author: markt
msg: The patch could have been smaller but I opted to align some of the code with Tomcat 7 (which meant re-ordering methods in places) to make it easier to compare 6.0.x code with 7.0.x code.
- always process TLDS with a namespace aware parser

author: hdu
msg: #i122301# set the BUILD64 flag for the 64bit Mac build
